meanings.definition: A place or facility where cars are washed.
meanings.sent1: I took my car to the carwash to get it cleaned.
meanings.sent2: The carwash down the street always does a great job.
meanings.sent3: The carwash was so busy that even the birds wanted a wash!
meanings.sent4: After the rain, the streets looked like a giant carwash for the city.
meanings.sent5: The carwash gleamed under the bright sun, inviting all the dirty cars.

meanings.definition: The act of washing a car.
meanings.sent1: My dad enjoys giving our car a carwash every weekend.
meanings.sent2: I always feel accomplished after a good carwash.
meanings.sent3: The carwash turned into a water fight between friends.
meanings.sent4: Her carwash skills were so good, she could make any car shine.
meanings.sent5: The carwash in the driveway was a family bonding activity on Sundays.
